variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: De-identified Subject ID

variable.name: Study
variable.description: Study name

variable.name: Sub_Study
variable.description: Sub-study name

variable.name: Sex
variable.description: Sex of Participant

variable.name: DSMIVMDD
variable.description: Affection status for DSM-IV Major Depressive Disorder

variable.name: Num_of_Episodes
variable.description: Number of distinct major depressive episodes of > 2 weeks in length

variable.name: Recur
variable.description: Indicates recurrent depression

variable.name: Early
variable.description: Indicates whether depression onset was prior to age 31

variable.name: Early_and_Recur
variable.description: Indicates whether the participant has both early-onset and recurrent depression

variable.name: Age_at_onset
variable.description: Age at which first major depressive episode occurred
variable.comment: If subject was interviewed more than once and reported different ages of onset, the earliest reported age was taken

variable.name: Age_at_Interview
variable.description: Age when the participant was interviewed
variable.comment: This is the age of interview in which they reported depression. If multiple interviews with reported depression occurred, age at first interview was taken

variable.name: Duration
variable.description: Duration of the longest episode of depression experienced
variable.comment: Reported duration of most serious depression. If multiple interviews report different lengths for the same episode, report from earliest interview was taken

variable.name: Instrument
variable.description: Diagnostic interview instrument used
variable.comment: Instrument used for measurement of severity score

variable.name: MDDscore
variable.description: Severity score

variable.name: MDD0
variable.description: Episode that severty score refers t0

variable.name: MDD1
variable.description: Presence or absence of DSM-IV MDD criterion 1
variable.value: symptom is not endorsed by respondent

variable.name: MDD2
variable.description: Presence or absence of DSM-IV MDD criterion 2
variable.value: symptom is not endorsed by respondent

variable.name: MDD3a
variable.description: Presence or absence of DSM-IV MDD criterion 3a
variable.value: symptom is not endorsed by respondent

variable.name: MDD3b
variable.description: Presence or absence of DSM-IV MDD criterion 3b
variable.value: symptom is not endorsed by respondent

variable.name: MDD4a
variable.description: Presence or absence of DSM-IV MDD criterion 4a
variable.value: symptom is not endorsed by respondent

variable.name: MDD4b
variable.description: Presence or absence of DSM-IV MDD criterion 4b
variable.value: symptom is not endorsed by respondent

variable.name: MDD5a
variable.description: Presence or absence of DSM-IV MDD criterion 5a
variable.value: symptom is not endorsed by respondent

variable.name: MDD5b
variable.description: Presence or absence of DSM-IV MDD criterion 5b
variable.value: symptom is not endorsed by respondent

variable.name: MDD6
variable.description: Presence or absence of DSM-IV MDD criterion 6
variable.value: symptom is not endorsed by respondent

variable.name: MDD7
variable.description: Presence or absence of DSM-IV MDD criterion 7
variable.value: symptom is not endorsed by respondent

variable.name: MDD8
variable.description: Presence or absence of DSM-IV MDD criterion 8
variable.value: symptom is not endorsed by respondent

variable.name: MDD9
variable.description: Presence or absence of DSM-IV MDD criterion 9
variable.value: symptom is not endorsed by respondent

variable.name: SuicideAtt
variable.description: Whether the participant has reported ever attempting suicide

variable.name: NumSeriousSuicideAttempts
variable.description: The number of reported suicide attempts

variable.name: GenAnxDis
variable.description: Score on generalized anxiety disorder scale
variable.comment: This scale was developed as part of a GWAS of anxiety phenotypes. 0 is no symptoms, 1 is sub-syndromal, 2 is full diagnosis of disorder
variable.value: some symptoms but not enough to meet DSM-IV criteria

variable.name: SocialPhobia
variable.description: Score on social phobia scale
variable.comment: This scale was developed as part of a GWAS of anxiety phenotypes. 0 is no symptoms, 1 is sub-syndromal, 2 is full diagnosis of disorder
variable.value: some symptoms but not enough to meet DSM-IV criteria

variable.name: PanicDis
variable.description: Score on panic disorder scale
variable.comment: This scale was developed as part of a GWAS of anxiety phenotypes. 0 is no symptoms, 1 is sub-syndromal, 2 is full diagnosis of disorder
variable.value: some symptoms but not enough to meet DSM-IV criteria

variable.name: AlcoholDepend
variable.description: DSM-IV alcohol dependence

variable.name: MaxStandardDrinks
variable.description: Maximum number of standard drinks consumed in a week

variable.name: RegularSmoker
variable.description: Ever having been a regular smoker
variable.comment: Ever having been a regular smoker, regardless of current smoking status

variable.name: NumberCigarettes
variable.description: Number of cigarettes smoked per day
variable.comment: Number of cigarettes smoked for day. For current smokers, this is the number that they currently smoke. For former smokers, this is the number that they smoked when they smoked the most.

variable.name: CurrentSmoker
variable.description: Current smoker

variable.name: NEUScore
variable.description: Neuroticism score from a personality questionnaire

variable.name: NEUscale
variable.description: Scale used to assess neuroticism
variable.comment: Neuroticism scale. One of EPQ12, EPQ23, NEO, ABV= dutch version

variable.name: In_PGC_MDD
variable.description: Is this subject included in the PGC study of MDD?
